name: Penguin Love (indiegamespro)
description:
Comands (WITH MOUSE ARROW ON SCREEN):

Press the  RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to jump.

Game(C2, C3, HTML5):Penguin Love.

Description:

Penguin Love is a game with 19 levels, where the objective is to get the coins for the portal to open and when entering the portal, you will pass the level. If you lose, a stage will return.

Instructions:

Use the mouse or tap to jump.

Controls:

Touch or Keyboard.

Characteristics:

  • Done with construct 2.
  • Working across HTML5 browsers
  • Playable in all browsers.
  • Touch & Mouse control.
  • 19 stages.
  • Save progress.
  • Pleasant music.
